Hello! I'm
{" "} Ayush Dhananjai

I'm a software Engineer with a passion for creating full-stack applications that enhance user experience. I am a former Astrophysicist turned Computer Scientist, currently pursuing a Masters degree at Northeastern University. I have worked as a Software Engineer at Oracle and Lutron Electronics and as a Data Scientist/Data Analyst at SharkNinja.

In my spare time, I love to fiddle with front-end projects. I am also a professional dancer! Feel free to checkout my latest performance{" "} here.
